        </label>

			</div>

<script>
    function deleteBackCall() {
        window.history.pushState("", "", '/homePage.do');
    }

            <script src="https://api.cludo.com/scripts/xdomain.js" slave="https://api.cludo.com/proxy.html" type="text/javascript"></script>
        <![endif]-->
        <script type="text/javascript" src="https://customer.cludo.com/scripts/bundles/search-script.min.js"></script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            var localeLanguage = 'en';
            var engineId = '10000632';
            var customerId = '10000426';

            var cludoStylesheet = document.createElement('link');
            cludoStylesheet.rel = 'stylesheet';
            cludoStylesheet.type = 'text/css';
            cludoStylesheet.href = 'https://customer.cludo.com/css/' + customerId + '/cludo-search.min.css';
            document.head.appendChild(cludoStylesheet);

            var CludoSearch;

            window.addEventListener('load', function () {
                var cludoSettings = {
                    customerId: customerId,
                    engineId: engineId,
                    searchUrl: "/search",
                    language: localeLanguage,
                    searchInputs: ['utilitySearchForm', 'siteSearchForm'],
                    loading: "<img src='/content/images/chrome/rebrand/aa-flight-icon.png' alt='american airlines logo' class='loading' role='progressbar' /><div class='loading-more-text' tabindex='-1'>Loading...</div><img src='/content/images/chrome/icons/loading.gif' alt='Loading' class='loading-more' role='progressbar' />",
                    hideSearchFilters: true,
                    hideResultsCount: true,
                    focusOnResultsAfterSearch: true,
                    disableAutocomplete: true,
                    paramsPrefix: "",
                    richAutocomplete: true,
                    customCallbackAfterSearch: sendAnalyticsAfterSearch
                };
                CludoSearch = new Cludo(cludoSettings);
                CludoSearch.init();
            });

            function sendAnalyticsAfterSearch() {
                if (utag != null) {
                    utag.view({
                        internal_search_keyword: CludoSearch.params.query,
                        channel: utag_data.channel,
                        page_name: utag_data.page_name,
                        login_status: utag_data.login_status,
                        site_country: utag_data.site_country,
                        site_language: utag_data.site_language,
                        site_indicator: utag_data.site_indicator,
                        tealium_environment: utag_data.tealium_environment,
                        tealium_profile: utag_data.tealium_profile,
                        server: utag_data.server,
                        error_id: utag_data.error_id,
                        loyalty_balance: utag_data.loyalty_balance,
                        loyalty_id: utag_data.loyalty_id,
                        loyalty_tier: utag_data.loyalty_tier,
                        gd_treatment_code: utag_data.gd_treatment_code,
                        partner_code_info: utag_data.partner_code_info,
                        time_stamp: getTimestamp()
                    });
                }
            };

            const getTimestamp = function () {
                const today = new Date()
                const month = padTS(today.getMonth() + 1)
                const day = padTS(today.getDate())
                const year = padTS(today.getFullYear())
                const hours = padTS(today.getHours())
                const minutes = padTS(today.getMinutes())
                const secs = padTS(today.getSeconds())

                return month + "/" + day + "/" + year + " " + hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + secs;
            };

            const padTS = function (field) {
                return (field.toString().length === 1 ? "0" + field : field);
            }

        </script>
    
</header>

<div class="notification notification--general notification--large">
    <div class="notification__icon" aria-hidden="true"><span></span></div>
    <div class="notification__body">
        <h2 class="header">
          Face coverings and COVID-19 testing requirements
        </h2>
        <p class="no-margin">
			A face covering is required by federal law when indoors at the airport and on board American Airlines flights. In addition, passengers flying to the U.S. from another country, including U.S. citizens, must show proof of a negative COVID-19 test taken within 3 days of departure, or documentation of recovery. These rules do not apply to children under 2. Passengers who may be exempt from wearing a face covering due to a disability must contact us before travel.
        </p> 
        <p class="no-margin">
            <a href="https://www.aa.com/i18n/travel-info/coronavirus-updates.jsp?#travelrequirements" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="font-family: Arial,sans-serif;">
				Read about travel requirements <span class="hidden-accessible">, Opens in a new window</span><span aria-hidden="true" class="icon-newpage"></span>
            </a>
        </p>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="footnote-prodcomp">
    <p>Benefits will vary depending on AAdvantage elite status. Visit the AAdvantage section of aa.com for your benefits.</p>
    <p>Terms and conditions: Information is valid for American Airlines and American Eagle marketed and operated flights. First/Business upgrades are subject to restrictions.</p>
    <ul class="suplist">
        <li><sup>1</sup> Available on flights with open seats within or between the U.S., Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands, Canada and the Caribbean. Difference in ticket price may apply. <a href="/i18n/customer-service/support/optional-service-fees.jsp#ticketing" target="_blank" class="aaDetroitBlue">Ticketing and other fees <span class="hidden-accessible">, Opens in a new window.</span><span class="icon-newpage" aria-hidden="true"></span></a></li>
        <li><sup>2</sup> Alcohol may not be available on all flights.</li>
        <li><sup>3</sup> Basic Economy fares bought on or after April 1, 2021 are non-refundable and non-changeable.</li>
        <li><sup>4</sup> 1 free checked bag on select flights. <a href="/i18n/customer-service/support/optional-service-fees.jsp" target="_blank" class="aaDetroitBlue">Bag fees <span class="hidden-accessible">, Opens in a new window.</span><span class="icon-newpage" aria-hidden="true"></span></a></li>
        <li><sup>5</sup> Complimentary for AAdvantage elite members based on status. British Airways, Finnair and Iberia have different rules for seats and boarding. Check with the airline that operates your flight.</li>
        <li><sup>6</sup> Upgrades to the next class of service are subject to availability. Fee is required if you are not an AAdvantage member with elite status. Upgrades are not available on transatlantic and transpacific flights or on select flights to/from Mexico, the Caribbean and Latin America.</li>
        <li><sup>7</sup> Doesn't apply to AAdvantage elite status members or eligible AAdvantage credit cardmembers.</li>
        <li><sup>8</sup> Free or included on transatlantic and transpacific flights and on select flights to/from Mexico, the Caribbean and Latin America.</li>
        <li><sup>9</sup> Enjoy complimentary access for you and a guest the day you travel, if you depart on, or connect to or from, a oneworld operated / marketed international flight.</li>
        <li><sup>10</sup> If you're an AAdvantage Executive Platinum, or on a plane with 3 cabins, you get 1 extra checked bag.</li>
    </ul>
</div>
